TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ComponentCommands extends System.Object
public ref class ComponentCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组标准的与组件相关的命令，这些命令具有预定义的按键输入笔势和 属性。

span.span: Provides a standard set of component-related commands, which have predefined key input gestures and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的命令类和另一部分中的命令命令库类，如和，用于表示一组的应用程序程序员经常遇到的常见命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令仅表示的实例不实现逻辑的命令。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 实现逻辑绑定到通过命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command via a . 例如，如果控件 （命令目标），执行的逻辑上执行命令命令可能无法提供命令目标，因此应用程序编写器负责编写逻辑，用于确定如何命令目标处理命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic that performs the command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer is responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target handles the command. 许多控件提供实现逻辑，不过，对于许多命令库中的命令。Many controls do provide implementation logic, though, for many of the commands in the command library. 例如，类提供了逻辑命令，命令，命令，命令，和命令。For example, the class provides logic for the command, command, command, command, and command. 请参阅有关详细信息的特定控件类的类文档。See the class documentation for particular control classes for more information. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ExtendSelectionDown As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ ExtendSelectionDown { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示“向下扩展选择”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Extend Selection Down command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示打算将选择向下扩展。This command indicates the intention to extend the selection downward. 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
